item.description:
USE THIS LISTING TO RESERVE A KAYAK FOR ALL S/O EVENTS, regardless of date.

ALSO REMEMBER TO RSVP FOR THE EVENT ITSELF.

There are two rental kayaks available for Seacoast Outdoors events.   Once you've checked that one of them is available for the event you'd like to attend, RSVP and pay the fee to reserve it for yourself.

In the comments section of your RSVP, enter the date and the event you're reserving it for.  -Thanks 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Kayaks Available

*14-foot Necky Looksha w/ skeg (pictured above)

*14-foot Necky Manitou w/ skeg

Both are very stable coastal kayaks, great for beginner or experienced paddlers.

Paddle and spray skirt included.  I also have one large and one small PFD (life vest) available.

The boat will be delivered to the meetup location for you.  Please help with loading and unloading it.

Liability Release

AS A CONDITION OF USING THIS KAYAK AND ITS ASSOCIATED EQUIPMENT, YOU ASSUME ALL RISK AND RESPONSIBILITY FOR USING IT SAFELY AND CORRECTLY.   FURTHER, YOU AGREE TO hold harmless, and indemnify the owner and his heirs, and all members and participants of the Seacoast Outdoors Meetup group from any and all claims for injury, illness, death, and/or property damage including those caused by negligence, ignorance, inexperience,  and other reasons. You also agree to assume all mental, physical, financial, and/or other risk associated with using this equipment.

Kayaking poses inherent risks and dangers. Use of this boat and equipment, and participation in meetup activities, is voluntary and dependent upon your own personal judgment.

Please inspect the boat and equipment and determine for yourself that it is in good working order. Be sure that you know how to use it safely.
item.name: Kayak Rental 2011
